name: PhpGlade, libglade for php
short_description: libglade implementation in php using Smarty-rendered widget sets. Use Glade or Glade for Windows to create your GUI. libglade displays it in-browser, either as a document or as a div. The best answer to Google's GWT! Vista widgets included.
